alert.note: Alert for Assumption; Eastern Ascension; Iberville; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 24 at 3:43PM CDT until August 25 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR CRITICAL FIRE CONDITIONS IN SOUTH MISSISSIPPI AND PORTIONS OF SOUTHEAST LOUISIANA... .In coordination with state and federal fire weather officials, along with the combination of the moderate to severe drought across the area, extreme temperatures, minimum relative humidity values below 35%, and area wide burn bans, critical fire weather conditions are expected to continue through tomorrow. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 8 PM CDT FRIDAY FOR CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS FOR PORTIONS OF SOUTHEAST LOUISIANA... The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a Red Flag Warning for critical fire weather conditions, which is in effect from 10 AM to 8 PM CDT Friday. * AFFECTED AREA...Iberville, Assumption, St. James, St. John The Baptist, Western Ascension and Eastern Ascension. * WINDS...East 5 to 10 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 35 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. A Burn Ban is already in place for all areas.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; Eastern Ascension; Iberville; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Western Ascension
